name: d2l-table
description: Mixins and CSS for applying table styles

scripts.test: concurrently -p name -n lint:js,lint:wc,galen,wct "npm run test:lint:js" "npm run test:lint:wc" "npm run test:galen" "wct --skip-plugin sauce"
scripts.dump:galen:polymer: npm run galen -- dump table.gspec --config galen.config --size 768x768 --url http://localhost:8080/components/d2l-table/demo/simple.html --export dumps/d2l-table
scripts.dump:galen: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve" "npm run dump:galen:polymer"
scripts.galen:polymer: npm run galen -- check table.gspec --config galen.config --size 768x768 --url http://localhost:8080/components/d2l-table/demo/simple.html --htmlreport reports/d2l-table
scripts.test:galen: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve" "npm run galen:polymer"

author: D2L Corporation
